posts.post_content: Just a beautiful card. She hoses planeswalkers, allies, the rare quests (since removing counters is part of the cost of cracking the common/uncommon ones, you can't respond by Hexmaging them), and makes [Dark Depths](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Depths) more than just a casual Johnny card. Plus, she's a 2/1 first striker for BB in a color that rarely gets first strike. LOVE IT.
posts.html:
Just a beautiful card. She hoses planeswalkers, allies, the rare quests (since removing counters is part of the cost of cracking the common/uncommon ones, you can't respond by Hexmaging them), and makes Dark Depths more than just a casual Johnny card. Plus, she's a 2/1 first striker for BB in a color that rarely gets first strike. LOVE IT.

posts.post_content:
This card is so strong in any block which deals with counters (i.e Time Spiral, Zendikar). If they had not changed the rules a while ago saying how you can't sacrifice creatures inresponce to going to the graveyard, then this would be broken.
  
4.5

posts.post_content:
Wow! If you are a vintage player like myself, you are gonna fall in love for a short time and get real bored out of your skull with that hot little shorty (yes... she's gonna be in all your black decks because she's just that strong!! For those who are not convinced, you will be soon enough, no matter how stubborn you could be). She's the best thing that came out since "Power Artifact + Grim Monolith", Tinker or Channel to my opinion. Allright, I'm not gonna say anything that has'nt been said yet so, here goes:
  
   
1. Dark Depths is a land, so it comes in free and Vampire Hexmage is 2 black mana to cast and her ability does'nt require her to tap which makes it avoid the "summoning sickness" rule in regards to her ability. Now, that's some pretty cheap explosive material and everybody knows that.
  
   
2. Next, you are going to create an explosive device to make this 20/20 bomb material explode on turn one... See where I'm getting at? Fling will do the trick! Soul's fire will keep the flame... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:

2. Next, you are going to create an explosive device to make this 20/20 bomb material explode on turn one... See where I'm getting at? Fling will do the trick! Soul's fire will keep the flame... (see all)
